Can filter and sort the survey results (within allowed parameters)
Can view comments on Seed Project pages
Can see Pledge Group listings, and Core Values

column3: Players committed to the Ethics Pledge Group
column4:
Registered player level for at least 25 calendar days
Support the Core Values
Support the Ethics Pledge Group (2)
Play both survey games
column5:
Achieve Supporter Badge 555
Can comment on Seed Project pages
Can see The Rituals Bonus Questions (view only)
What ritual should we follow and why, when a child is born?
What ritual should we do when children pass through puberty, transition from children to adult?
What ritual should we follow when two people are married?
What ritual should we follow when a person dies?
What other ritual(s) should we be following?
Optional: Can Create A Character (if they activate it on their own; no prompt provided in published matrix)
Choose an Archetype
Pick 5 Attributes for Your Character
Name Your Character
Upload Character Picture (Not until Sustainer Level)
Can see Sustainability Action Plan web page

Create Character’s Quest Request
Upload Character Picture (Not Required)
Complete Rituals Bonus Questions
